Compton.Green Meadows, Los Angeles: The Green Meadows district of Los Angeles is a 2.22-square-mile neighborhood in Los Angeles, California with a population of more than thirty thousand people. Green Meadows is within the South Los Angeles region and is the home of Locke College Preparatory Academy. It is notable within the city for its relatively low household income, its youthful population, its high average household size and the percentage of its families headed by single parents.
